objects.rotten-egg.name: Rotten Egg
objects.rotten-egg.description: This egg is long past its expiration date, if the smell is any indication.
objects.ablaze-orbs.name: Wizad's Ablaze Orbs
objects.ablaze-orbs.description: A pack of little red candies filled with cinnamon. They'll burn your tongue away, yet you will crave for more.
objects.raisins.name: Moe's Raisins

objects.vanilla-wafer.description: Mmm... Even the sight brings back memories.
objects.luxurious-truffle.name: Lux-urious Truffles
objects.luxurious-truffle.description: It's so chic that you're reluctant to remove the package.
objects.candy-corn.name: Candy Corn
objects.candy-corn.description: A staple of Spirit's Eve candy, even though it's not very tasty.
objects.apple-candy.name: Apple Candy
objects.apple-candy.description: A fall classic, apples covered in caramel and have a stick through.
objects.licorice-swirl.name: Licorice Swirl
objects.licorice-swirl.description: Tough and pungent for its stranger. Gives a roller-coaster of various tastes when eaten.

objects.candied-bacon-stick.name: Candied Bacon Stick
objects.braincell-gum.name: Braincell Gum
objects.batsdrop.name: Batsdrop
objects.batsdrop.description: A treat with an excellent taste most wont deny.
objects.eye-candy.name: Sour Eye Candy
objects.eye-candy.description: Despite the name, it's not as amazing to look at.
objects.ghost-meringue.name: Ghost Meringue
objects.witch-cauldron.name: Witch's Cauldron
objects.dino-cookie.name: Dino Cookie
The green crust hides filling hot as a pepper rex's fire!
objects.gingerbread-tombstone.name: Gingerbread Tombstone
objects.joja-canes.name: JojaCanes
objects.joja-canes.description: Joja-brand candy canes. For some reason, the manufacturer insists that they only ever be held upside down.
objects.joja-gummies.name: JojaGummies
objects.joja-gummies.description: Joja-brand little gummies. Watch everyone's faces wrinkle with this sourness!
